org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp

Class NodeImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.NodeImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NodeListener, Node
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterNodeImp, RunnableNode

    public class NodeImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements NodeListener, Node
    An input/output NodeCable associated with a Task.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NodeImp(Task task, boolean input)
      Creates a node attached to the specified Task.

      • getAbsoluteNodeIndex

        public int getAbsoluteNodeIndex()
        This is a convience method to provide backward compatibility with TrianaGUI, in which parameter nodes where indexed after data nodes.

        The absolute index of a data node is the same as its standard index. The absolute index of a parameter node is its standard index + the total number of data input node.

        Specified by:
        getAbsoluteNodeIndex in interface Node
        Returns:
        the absolute index of this node within its associated Task.

      • connect

        Connect a cable to this node. Should only be called from within cable.
        Specified by:

        Disconnect the cable from this node. Should only be called from within cable.
